sausage_core.api.event

类 InfoCardEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.EntityEvent
        • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.living.LivingEvent
          • net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.PlayerEvent
            • sausage_core.api.event.InfoCardEvent

  • public class InfoCardEvent
extends net.minecraftforge.event.entity.player.PlayerEvent
    This event is fired when a player uses a info card.
    This event is not Cancelable.

    This event does not have a result. HasResult

    This event is fired on the INFO_CARD_BUS.
